page.title: 03FARMING
page.content: The sheep farm is of 66 acres arranged in five fields:one for their five cows one fallow,one for hay and the others for the sheep using electric fences for strip grazing. They have 250 sheep -Welsh Lleyn,Romney,Kent and British Friesland.They have this last breed because they are good milkers and sheep's milk is becoming more and more popular with people who are allergic to cow's milk. They have a sheep-dog which they had to have trained , a terrier for ratting and some chicken. In summer the sheep are shorn by con- tractors(who travel to Australia and New Zealand in our winter),and the wool is sold to the Wool Marketing Board.
